aka: Last Waltz In The Old Mill

writer.name: 杜尚·武科蒂奇 Dušan Vukotić

trans_title: 老磨房里最后的华尔兹
Last Waltz In The Old Mill
introduction: A combined live action/animated story in the tradition of the most beautiful fairy tales. In an old mill one grain of wheat and one grain of corn are dancing their first and last dance. Like the little prince and little princess they experience their . timeless love and end up grounded along with thousands of other grains. But this is not a tragic story! In eternal contin¬uation of life, wheat and corn are turned into the precious flour.A relatively new (1995) film, it was written by Oscar-winner Dusan Vukotic. In live action, an old man feeds a flower mill. Two seeds are then transferred into animated lovers who dance their last waltz.
chinese_title: 老磨房里最后的华尔兹
